metadata.title: CVE-2021-45463 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: load_cache in GEGL before 0.4.34 allows shell expansion when a pathname ina constructed command line is not escaped or filtered. This is caused byuse of the system library function for execution of the ImageMagick convertfallback in magick-load. NOTE: GEGL releases before 0.4.34 are used in GIMPreleases before 2.10.30; however, this does not imply that GIMP buildsenable the vulnerable feature.

criterions.comment: gegl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
